about: I am a computer engineer specialized in Machine Learning and Artificial intelligence,with also a strong background in software development.
I graduated at Polytechnic of Milan in 2021 and in the same period I started working as a Full stack developer at Cisco Systems, where I'm still working.

abilities.title: ML Engineer
abilities.text: During Master degree I have focused on Machine Learning and AI techniques. I obtained a strong theoretical base and got to challenge myself on various projects in this area.

abilities.title: Full Stack Developer
abilities.text: I have worked as a Freelance SE during university years and at Cisco after graduation. I like to work as full stack developer becasue it allows to see the 'full-scope' of an idea: from the problem to the solution.

abilities.title: Problem Solving
abilities.text: I am an engineer: I always remember that when I write my code. I think it's better to study the problem before starting the implementation.

abilities.title: Time Managment
abilities.text: I have been a professional athlete during my university years, I used to schedule 10 training sessions a week and my exams. I can handle your problem too.

abilities.title: Learning Enthusiast
abilities.text: I love learning new stuff. Both on my personal project and during my work, I'm always prone to study or to learn from others.

abilities.title: Goal Focused
abilities.text: I give my best when my objective is clear: You can't solve a problem without knowing it.

citation.author: Douglas Hofstadter
citation.text: Hofstadter's Law: It always takes longer than you expect, even when you take into account Hofstadter's Law.

name: Gabriele Aquaro
